ygData.subject: Re: get this
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to disagree with this. I once duelled a monk who was a lvl higher then me and I wiped the floor with hmi. I lost one bub while he had lost 3 when we
ygData.messageBody:
I have to disagree with this. I once duelled a monk who was a lvl higher then me and I wiped the floor with hmi. I lost one bub while he had lost 3 when we both turned to kill something that was passing by. This was when I was lvl 8 (he was lvl 9) and I didn't even have any spells yet.

Inos

PS. I also challenge a lvl 18 wizard to a duel when I was lvl 15 and he refused. Go figure



Robert Porter wrote:

> From: Robert Porter <frog42@...>
>
> Think about it this way, when somebody is a level better than you at sports, you don't even touch the ball. levels should be considered to be dynamic. you shouldn't stand a chance against people of other levels, and people who are high in your level should also beat you because they have probably maxed out their skills, while you still need to. that's my interpretation of it.
>
> Kakrot, DEF level 9
> Innoruuk
>
